definition: A fixed receptacle with a water supply and a flushing mechanism, used for the disposal of human waste.
example: Where is the toilet, please?
koChirpScript: toilet. 화장실 이라는 뜻입니다. Where is the toilet, please? 화장실이 어디에 있나요?

definition: A glossy red, or occasionally yellow, pulpy edible fruit that is eaten as a vegetable or in salad.
example: I like tomatoes in my salad.
koChirpScript: tomato. 토마토 라는 뜻입니다. I like tomatoes in my salad. 나는 샐러드에 들어간 토마토를 좋아한다.

definition: On the day after today.
example: See you tomorrow.
koChirpScript: tomorrow. 내일 이라는 뜻입니다. See you tomorrow. 내일 봐요.

definition: On the present or approaching evening or night.
example: What are you doing tonight?
koGloss: adv. 오늘 밤에; n. 오늘 밤
koChirpScript: tonight. 오늘 밤 이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing tonight? 오늘 밤에 뭐 하니?

definition: To a higher degree than is desirable, permissible, or possible; excessively.
example: It's too hot today.
koChirpScript: too. 너무 또는 또한 이라는 뜻입니다. It's too hot today. 오늘은 너무 덥다.

definition: Each of a set of hard, bony enamel-coated structures in the jaws of most vertebrates, used for biting and chewing.
example: I need to brush my teeth.
koChirpScript: tooth. 이 또는 치아 라는 뜻입니다. 복수형은 teeth 입니다. I need to brush my teeth. 나는 이를 닦아야 한다.

definition: A matter dealt with in a text, discourse, or conversation; a subject.
example: Let's change the topic.
koChirpScript: topic. 주제 라는 뜻입니다. Let's change the topic. 주제를 바꾸자.

definition: A person who is traveling or visiting a place for pleasure.
example: The city is full of tourists in the summer.
koChirpScript: tourist. 관광객 이라는 뜻입니다. The city is full of tourists in the summer. 여름에는 그 도시에 관광객이 가득하다.

definition: A built-up area with a name, defined boundaries, and local government, that is larger than a village and generally smaller than a city.
example: I live in a small town.
koChirpScript: town. 도시 또는 읍내 라는 뜻입니다. I live in a small town. 나는 작은 도시에 산다.

definition: Vehicles moving on a road or public highway.
example: The traffic is heavy this morning.
koChirpScript: traffic. 교통 이라는 뜻입니다. The traffic is heavy this morning. 오늘 아침은 교통 체증이 심하다.

definition: A series of railroad cars moved as a unit by a locomotive or propelled by integral motors.
example: I take the train to work.
koChirpScript: train. 기차 라는 뜻입니다. I take the train to work. 나는 기차를 타고 출근한다.

definition: Make a journey, typically of some length or abroad; the action of traveling.
example: I love to travel. Travel is my passion.
koExample: 나는 여행하는 것을 아주 좋아한다. 여행은 나의 열정이다.
koChirpScript: travel. 여행하다 또는 여행 이라는 뜻입니다. I love to travel. 나는 여행하는 것을 아주 좋아한다. Travel is my passion. 여행은 나의 열정이다.

definition: A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk growing to a considerable height and bearing lateral branches at some distance from the ground.
example: There is a big tree in our garden.
koChirpScript: tree. 나무 라는 뜻입니다. There is a big tree in our garden. 우리 정원에는 큰 나무가 있다.

definition: A journey or excursion, especially for pleasure.
example: We are going on a trip to the mountains.
koChirpScript: trip. 여행 이라는 뜻입니다. We are going on a trip to the mountains. 우리는 산으로 여행을 갈 것이다.

definition: A large, heavy motor vehicle used for transporting goods, materials, or troops.
example: The truck is carrying a heavy load.
koChirpScript: truck. 트럭 이라는 뜻입니다. The truck is carrying a heavy load. 트럭이 무거운 짐을 싣고 있다.

definition: In accordance with fact or reality.
example: Is it true that you are moving?
koChirpScript: true. 사실인 또는 진짜의 라는 뜻입니다. Is it true that you are moving? 네가 이사 간다는 것이 사실이니?

definition: Make an attempt or effort to do something.
example: You should try to be on time.
koChirpScript: try. 노력하다 또는 시도하다 라는 뜻입니다. You should try to be on time. 너는 제시간에 오도록 노력해야 한다.

definition: A short-sleeved casual top, having the shape of a T when spread out flat.
example: I am wearing a white T-shirt.
koChirpScript: T-shirt. 티셔츠 라는 뜻입니다. I am wearing a white T-shirt. 나는 흰색 티셔츠를 입고 있다.

definition: The day of the week before Wednesday and following Monday.
example: I have a meeting on Tuesday.
koChirpScript: Tuesday. 화요일 이라는 뜻입니다. I have a meeting on Tuesday. 나는 화요일에 회의가 있다.

definition: Move in a circular direction wholly or partly around an axis or point; an act of moving something in a circular direction.
example: Turn right at the corner. It's your turn to play.
koExample: 모퉁이에서 오른쪽으로 도세요. 네가 플레이할 차례야.
koChirpScript: turn. 돌다 또는 차례 라는 뜻입니다. Turn right at the corner. 모퉁이에서 오른쪽으로 도세요. It's your turn to play. 네가 플레이할 차례야.

definition: Television.
example: What's on TV tonight?
koChirpScript: TV. 텔레비전의 줄임말입니다. What's on TV tonight? 오늘 밤 TV에서 뭐 하니?

definition: Equivalent to the sum of ten and two; one more than eleven; 12.
example: There are twelve months in a year.
koChirpScript: twelve. 숫자 12를 의미합니다. There are twelve months in a year. 1년은 12개월이다.

definition: Equivalent to the product of two and ten; one more than nineteen; 20.
example: She is twenty years old.
koChirpScript: twenty. 숫자 20을 의미합니다. She is twenty years old. 그녀는 20세이다.

definition: Two times; on two occasions.
example: I've seen that movie twice.
koExample: 나는 그 영화를 두 번 봤다.
koChirpScript: twice. 두 번 이라는 뜻입니다. I've seen that movie twice. 나는 그 영화를 두 번 봤다.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of one and one; one less than three; 2.
example: I have two sisters.
koChirpScript: two. 숫자 2를 의미합니다. I have two sisters. 나는 여동생이 두 명 있다.

definition: A category of people or things having common characteristics.
example: What type of music do you like?
koChirpScript: type. 유형 또는 종류 라는 뜻입니다. What type of music do you like? 어떤 종류의 음악을 좋아하세요?

definition: A device consisting of a circular canopy of cloth on a folding metal frame supported by a central rod, used as protection against rain or sometimes sun.
example: It's raining, so you should take an umbrella.
koChirpScript: umbrella. 우산 이라는 뜻입니다. It's raining, so you should take an umbrella. 비가 오니 우산을 가져가야 한다.

definition: The brother of one's father or mother or the husband of one's aunt.
example: My uncle lives in Australia.
koChirpScript: uncle. 삼촌, 외삼촌, 이모부, 고모부 라는 뜻입니다. My uncle lives in Australia. 나의 삼촌은 호주에 사신다.

definition: Extending or directly below.
example: The cat is under the table.
koChirpScript: under. 무엇무엇 아래에 라는 뜻입니다. The cat is under the table. 고양이가 테이블 아래에 있다.

definition: Perceive the intended meaning of (words, a language, or a speaker).
example: I don't understand the question.
koChirpScript: understand. 이해하다 라는 뜻입니다. I don't understand the question. 나는 그 질문을 이해하지 못하겠다.

definition: A high-level educational institution in which students study for degrees and academic research is done.
example: He is a student at a famous university.
koChirpScript: university. 대학교 라는 뜻입니다. He is a student at a famous university. 그는 유명한 대학교의 학생이다.

definition: Up to the point in time or the event mentioned.
example: Let's wait until the rain stops.
koChirpScript: until. 무엇무엇할 때까지 라는 뜻입니다. Let's wait until the rain stops. 비가 그칠 때까지 기다리자.

definition: Toward a higher place or position.
example: Look up at the sky.
koChirpScript: up. 위로 라는 뜻입니다. Look up at the sky. 하늘을 올려다봐.

definition: On or to an upper floor of a building.
example: My bedroom is upstairs.
koChirpScript: upstairs. 위층으로 라는 뜻입니다. My bedroom is upstairs. 내 침실은 위층에 있다.

definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people as the object of a verb or preposition.
example: Can you help us?
koChirpScript: us. '우리를' 이라는 뜻의 목적격 대명사입니다. Can you help us? 우리를 도와주시겠어요?

definition: Take, hold, or deploy (something) as a means of accomplishing a purpose or achieving a result; employ.
example: Can I use your pen?
koChirpScript: use. 사용하다 라는 뜻입니다. Can I use your pen? 펜 좀 써도 될까요?

definition: Able to be used for a practical purpose or in several ways.
example: This is a very useful tool.
koChirpScript: useful. 유용한 이라는 뜻입니다. This is a very useful tool. 이것은 매우 유용한 도구이다.

definition: Under normal conditions; generally.
example: I usually wake up at 7 a.m.
koChirpScript: usually. 보통 또는 대개 라는 뜻의 빈도부사입니다. I usually wake up at 7 a.m. 나는 보통 아침 7시에 일어난다.

definition: An extended period of leisure and recreation, especially one spent away from home or in traveling.
example: We are going on vacation to Hawaii.
koChirpScript: vacation. 휴가 라는 뜻입니다. We are going on vacation to Hawaii. 우리는 하와이로 휴가를 갈 것이다.

definition: A plant or part of a plant used as food, such as a cabbage, potato, turnip, or bean.
example: You should eat more vegetables.
koChirpScript: vegetable. 채소 라는 뜻입니다. You should eat more vegetables. 채소를 더 많이 먹어야 한다.

definition: In a high degree.
example: It's very cold today.
koChirpScript: very. 매우 또는 아주 라는 뜻입니다. It's very cold today. 오늘 매우 춥다.

definition: The recording, reproducing, or broadcasting of moving visual images.
example: Let's watch a video.
koChirpScript: video. 비디오 라는 뜻입니다. Let's watch a video. 비디오를 보자.

definition: Go to see and spend time with (someone) socially; an act of visiting someone or something.
example: I'm going to visit my grandparents. We had a short visit.
koExample: 나는 조부모님을 뵈러 갈 것이다. 우리는 짧은 방문을 했다.
koChirpScript: visit. 방문하다 또는 방문 이라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to visit my grandparents. 나는 조부모님을 뵈러 갈 것이다. We had a short visit. 우리는 짧은 방문을 했다.

definition: A person visiting someone or somewhere, especially socially or as a tourist.
example: We have a visitor from Japan.
koChirpScript: visitor. 방문객 이라는 뜻입니다. We have a visitor from Japan. 우리는 일본에서 온 방문객이 있다.

definition: Stay where one is or delay action until a particular time or until something else happens.
example: Please wait for me.
koChirpScript: wait. 기다리다 라는 뜻입니다. Please wait for me. 나를 기다려 주세요.

definition: A man whose job is to serve customers at their tables in a restaurant.
example: The waiter took our order.
koChirpScript: waiter. 남자 종업원을 의미합니다. The waiter took our order. 웨이터가 우리 주문을 받았다.

definition: Emerge or cause to emerge from a state of sleep; stop sleeping.
example: What time do you wake up?
koChirpScript: wake. 깨다 또는 일어나다 라는 뜻입니다. What time do you wake up? 몇 시에 일어나니?

definition: Move at a regular pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn, never having both feet off the ground at once; an act of traveling or an excursion on foot.
example: Let's go for a walk. I walk to school every day.
koExample: 산책하러 가자. 나는 매일 걸어서 학교에 간다.
koChirpScript: walk. 걷다 또는 산책 이라는 뜻입니다. Let's go for a walk. 산책하러 가자. I walk to school every day. 나는 매일 걸어서 학교에 간다.

definition: A continuous vertical brick or stone structure that encloses or divides an area of land.
example: There is a picture on the wall.
koChirpScript: wall. 벽 이라는 뜻입니다. There is a picture on the wall. 벽에 그림이 걸려 있다.

definition: Have a desire to possess or do (something); wish for.
example: What do you want to eat?
koChirpScript: want. 원하다 라는 뜻입니다. What do you want to eat? 무엇을 먹고 싶니?

definition: Of or at a fairly or comfortably high temperature.
example: It's a warm day today.
koChirpScript: warm. 따뜻한 이라는 뜻입니다. It's a warm day today. 오늘은 따뜻한 날이다.

definition: Clean with water and, typically, soap or detergent.
example: You should wash your hands before meals.
koChirpScript: wash. 씻다 라는 뜻입니다. You should wash your hands before meals. 식사 전에 손을 씻어야 한다.

definition: Look at or observe attentively over a period of time; a small timepiece worn typically on a strap on one's wrist.
example: I like to watch movies. He looked at his watch.
koExample: 나는 영화 보는 것을 좋아한다. 그는 손목시계를 보았다.
koChirpScript: watch. 보다 또는 손목시계 라는 뜻입니다. I like to watch movies. 나는 영화 보는 것을 좋아한다. He looked at his watch. 그는 손목시계를 보았다.

definition: A colorless, transparent, odorless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain and is the basis of the fluids of living organisms.
example: Can I have a glass of water, please?
koChirpScript: water. 물 이라는 뜻입니다. Can I have a glass of water, please? 물 한 잔 주시겠어요?

definition: A method, style, or manner of doing something.
example: Can you show me the way to the station?
koChirpScript: way. 길 또는 방법 이라는 뜻입니다. Can you show me the way to the station? 역으로 가는 길 좀 알려주시겠어요?

definition: Used by a speaker to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people considered together.
example: We are going to the park.
koChirpScript: we. '우리는' 이라는 뜻의 주격 대명사입니다. We are going to the park. 우리는 공원에 갈 것이다.

definition: Have (something) on one's body as clothing, decoration, or protection.
example: What are you going to wear to the party?
koChirpScript: wear. 입다 라는 뜻입니다. What are you going to wear to the party? 파티에 무엇을 입고 갈 거니?

definition: The state of the atmosphere at a place and time as regards heat, dryness, sunshine, wind, rain, etc.
example: The weather is nice today.
koChirpScript: weather. 날씨 라는 뜻입니다. The weather is nice today. 오늘 날씨가 좋다.

definition: A set of related web pages located under a single domain name, typically produced by a single person or organization.
example: You can find more information on our website.
koExample: 더 많은 정보는 저희 웹사이트에서 찾을 수 있습니다.
koChirpScript: website. 웹사이트 라는 뜻입니다. You can find more information on our website. 더 많은 정보는 저희 웹사이트에서 찾을 수 있습니다.

definition: The day of the week before Thursday and following Tuesday.
example: I have a class on Wednesday.
koChirpScript: Wednesday. 수요일 이라는 뜻입니다. I have a class on Wednesday. 나는 수요일에 수업이 있다.

definition: A period of seven days.
example: There are seven days in a week.
koChirpScript: week. 주 또는 주일 이라는 뜻입니다. There are seven days in a week. 일주일은 7일이다.

definition: Saturday and Sunday, especially regarded as a time for leisure.
example: What are you doing this weekend?
koChirpScript: weekend. 주말 이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing this weekend? 이번 주말에 뭐 하니?

definition: Used as a friendly greeting to someone who has just arrived.
example: Welcome to our home!
koGloss: exclam. 환영합니다; v. 환영하다; adj. 환영받는
koChirpScript: welcome. 환영한다는 뜻입니다. Welcome to our home! 우리 집에 오신 것을 환영합니다!

definition: In a good or satisfactory way.
example: He speaks English very well.
koGloss: adv. 잘; adj. 건강한; exclam. 음
koChirpScript: well. 잘 또는 건강한 이라는 뜻입니다. He speaks English very well. 그는 영어를 매우 잘한다.

definition: The direction toward the point of the horizon where the sun sets at the equinoxes, on the left-hand side of a person facing north, or the part of the horizon lying in this direction.
example: The sun sets in the west.
koGloss: n. 서쪽; adj. 서쪽의; adv. 서쪽으로
koChirpScript: west. 서쪽 이라는 뜻입니다. The sun sets in the west. 해는 서쪽으로 진다.

definition: Asking for information specifying something.
example: What is your name?
koChirpScript: what. 무엇 이라는 뜻의 의문사입니다. What is your name? 이름이 무엇인가요?

definition: At what time.
example: When is your birthday?
koGloss: adv. 언제; pron. 언제; conj. ~할 때
koChirpScript: when. 언제 또는 무엇무엇할 때 라는 뜻입니다. When is your birthday? 생일이 언제인가요?

definition: In or to what place or position.
example: Where do you live?
koChirpScript: where. 어디에 라는 뜻의 의문사입니다. Where do you live? 어디에 사세요?

definition: Asking for information specifying one or more people or things from a definite set.
example: Which color do you prefer?
koChirpScript: which. 어느 것 이라는 뜻의 의문사입니다. Which color do you prefer? 어느 색을 더 선호하세요?

definition: Of the color of milk or fresh snow, due to the reflection of all visible rays of light; the cold color of maximum lightness.
example: She is wearing a white dress.
koChirpScript: white. 흰색의 또는 흰색 이라는 뜻입니다. She is wearing a white dress. 그녀는 흰색 드레스를 입고 있다.

definition: What or which person or people.
example: Who is that man?
koChirpScript: who. 누구 라는 뜻의 의문사입니다. Who is that man? 저 남자는 누구인가요?

definition: For what reason or purpose.
example: Why are you late?
koChirpScript: why. 왜 라는 뜻의 의문사입니다. Why are you late? 왜 늦었니?

definition: A married woman considered in relation to her spouse.
example: He loves his wife very much.
koChirpScript: wife. 아내 라는 뜻입니다. 복수형은 wives 입니다. He loves his wife very much. 그는 아내를 매우 사랑한다.

definition: Expressing the future tense.
example: I will see you tomorrow.
koChirpScript: will. 미래를 나타내는 조동사, 무엇무엇할 것이다 라는 뜻입니다. I will see you tomorrow. 내일 뵙겠습니다.

definition: Be successful or victorious in (a contest or conflict).
example: I hope our team will win the game.
koChirpScript: win. 이기다 라는 뜻입니다. I hope our team will win the game. 우리 팀이 경기에서 이기기를 바란다.

definition: An opening in the wall or roof of a building or vehicle that is fitted with glass or other transparent material in a frame to admit light or air and allow people to see out.
example: Please open the window.
koChirpScript: window. 창문 이라는 뜻입니다. Please open the window. 창문 좀 열어주세요.

definition: An alcoholic drink made from fermented grape juice.
example: Would you like a glass of red wine?
koChirpScript: wine. 와인 또는 포도주 라는 뜻입니다. Would you like a glass of red wine? 레드 와인 한 잔 하시겠어요?

definition: The coldest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from December to February and in the southern hemisphere from June to August.
example: It snows a lot in the winter.
koChirpScript: winter. 겨울 이라는 뜻입니다. It snows a lot in the winter. 겨울에는 눈이 많이 온다.

definition: Accompanied by (another person or thing).
example: I'm going to the movies with my friends.
koExample: 나는 친구들과 함께 영화를 보러 갈 것이다.
koChirpScript: with. 무엇무엇과 함께 라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to the movies with my friends. 나는 친구들과 함께 영화를 보러 갈 것이다.

definition: Not having or using (something); not accompanied by.
example: I can't live without you.
koChirpScript: without. 무엇무엇 없이 라는 뜻입니다. I can't live without you. 너 없이는 살 수 없어.

definition: An adult human female.
example: She is a strong and independent woman.
koChirpScript: woman. 여자 라는 뜻입니다. 복수형은 women 입니다. She is a strong and independent woman. 그녀는 강하고 독립적인 여성이다.

definition: Inspiring delight, pleasure, or admiration; extremely good; marvelous.
example: We had a wonderful time.
koChirpScript: wonderful. 아주 멋진 또는 훌륭한 이라는 뜻입니다. We had a wonderful time. 우리는 아주 멋진 시간을 보냈다.

definition: A single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing, used with others (or sometimes alone) to form a sentence and typically shown with a space on either side when written or printed.
example: Can you say that word again?
koExample: 그 단어를 다시 말해줄 수 있나요?
koChirpScript: word. 단어 라는 뜻입니다. Can you say that word again? 그 단어를 다시 말해줄 수 있나요?

definition: Activity involving mental or physical effort done in order to achieve a purpose or result; a task or tasks to be undertaken.
example: I have to work late tonight. I have a lot of work to do.
koExample: 나는 오늘 밤 늦게까지 일해야 한다. 할 일이 많다.
koChirpScript: work. 일하다 또는 일 이라는 뜻입니다. I have to work late tonight. 나는 오늘 밤 늦게까지 일해야 한다. I have a lot of work to do. 할 일이 많다.

definition: A person who does a specified type of work or who works in a specified way.
example: He is a hard worker.
koChirpScript: worker. 노동자 또는 일하는 사람 이라는 뜻입니다. He is a hard worker. 그는 열심히 일하는 사람이다.

definition: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.
example: I want to travel the world.
koChirpScript: world. 세계 라는 뜻입니다. I want to travel the world. 나는 세계를 여행하고 싶다.

definition: Used to express a polite request.
example: Would you like a cup of coffee?
koChirpScript: would. 공손한 요청을 나타내는 조동사입니다. Would you like a cup of coffee? 커피 한 잔 하시겠어요?

definition: Mark (letters, words, or other symbols) on a surface, typically paper, with a pen, pencil, or similar implement.
example: Please write your name here.
koChirpScript: write. 쓰다 라는 뜻입니다. Please write your name here. 여기에 이름을 써 주세요.

definition: A person who has written a particular text.
example: She is a famous writer.
koChirpScript: writer. 작가 라는 뜻입니다. She is a famous writer. 그녀는 유명한 작가이다.

definition: The activity or skill of marking coherent words on paper and composing text.
example: Writing is a good way to express your feelings.
koChirpScript: writing. 글쓰기 라는 뜻입니다. Writing is a good way to express your feelings. 글쓰기는 감정을 표현하는 좋은 방법이다.

definition: Not correct or true; incorrect.
example: This is the wrong answer.
koChirpScript: wrong. 틀린 이라는 뜻입니다. This is the wrong answer. 이것은 틀린 답이다.

definition: A piece of uncultivated ground adjoining a building, typically one enclosed by walls or other buildings.
example: The children are playing in the yard.
koChirpScript: yard. 마당 이라는 뜻입니다. The children are playing in the yard. 아이들이 마당에서 놀고 있다.

definition: Yes.
example: “Are you coming?” “Yeah.”
koChirpScript: yeah. '응' 또는 '그래' 라는 뜻으로, yes의 비격식적인 표현입니다. “Are you coming?” “Yeah.” “올 거니?” “응.”

definition: The time taken by the earth to make one revolution around the sun.
example: There are 365 days in a year.
koChirpScript: year. 년 또는 해 라는 뜻입니다. There are 365 days in a year. 1년은 365일이다.

definition: Of the color between green and orange in the spectrum, a primary color in subtractive color systems.
example: The sun is yellow.
koChirpScript: yellow. 노란색의 또는 노란색 이라는 뜻입니다. The sun is yellow. 태양은 노란색이다.

definition: Used to give an affirmative response.
example: “Are you ready?” “Yes, I am.”
koChirpScript: yes. '네' 또는 '예' 라는 뜻으로, 긍정적인 대답을 할 때 씁니다. “Are you ready?” “Yes, I am.” “준비됐니?” “네, 됐어요.”

definition: On the day before today.
example: I saw him yesterday.
koChirpScript: yesterday. 어제 라는 뜻입니다. I saw him yesterday. 나는 어제 그를 봤다.

definition: Used to refer to the person or people that the speaker is addressing.
example: You are my best friend.
koChirpScript: you. '너는' 또는 '당신은' 이라는 뜻입니다. You are my best friend. 너는 나의 가장 친한 친구이다.

definition: Having lived or existed for only a short time.
example: She is a young girl.
koChirpScript: young. 어린 또는 젊은 이라는 뜻입니다. She is a young girl. 그녀는 어린 소녀이다.

definition: Belonging to or associated with the person or people that the speaker is addressing.
example: Is this your book?
koChirpScript: your. '너의' 또는 '당신의' 라는 뜻의 소유격입니다. Is this your book? 이것은 너의 책이니?

definition: Used to refer to the person being addressed as the object of a verb or preposition when they are also the subject of the clause.
example: You should believe in yourself.
koChirpScript: yourself. 너 자신 이라는 뜻의 재귀대명사입니다. You should believe in yourself. 너 자신을 믿어야 한다.
